column4: anyone which version of swiftweasel should I install for my cpu? I don't know which one shoudl i install

if its core2duo it'll be amd64 or x86_64 -

athlon64, athlontbird, athlonxp, k6, k8, nocona, p2, p3, p3m. p4. p4m. pmm, prescott

core 2 duo
